author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Tuesday announced solatium to the families of persons who died in various incidents in the past few months.

Ms. Jayalalithaa, in a statement, expressed her condolences to the bereaved families and said that the solatium would be given from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund.

Three Tangedco employees and eight others from other departments were electrocuted in separate incidents between August and November last year. Their families would get a sum of Rs. 3 lakh each. The family of Sub Inspector Rajagopalan of District Crime Records Bureau in Pudukkottai district, who died of cardiac arrest on January 31, would get a sum of Rs. 3 lakh.

The families of another three persons who died in various accidents would be given Rs. 1 lakh each.
title: Solatium announced
